title: Jordan Peterson and Jonathan Pageau: First Thoughts
description:
Yesterday (Sunday) the @Jordan B Peterson @Jonathan Pageau conversation dropped in the podcast form. I'm sure the YouTube isn't far behind. I'm going to do a commentary on it, of course, but I wanted to get this introduction out based on my observations late last night after my first listen through. At this point this might be the first section of a much longer video. We'll see. 

The Podcast: https://www.podbean.com/media/share/dir-s57hm-d40cd6c
